tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    followers_count INT,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES social_media_users(user_id),
    post_content TEXT,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE sentiments (
    sentiment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id UUID REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_type VARCHAR(20),
    analyzed_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE engagements (
    engagement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id UUID REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    shares_count INT,
    bookmarks_count INT,
    engagement_type VARCHAR(20),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_accounts (
    username VARCHAR(50),
    account_type VARCHAR(20),
    followers INT,
    posts_count INT,
    last_post_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    comment_content TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP
);
